overview: While Jane Holman is driving with her two sons, she accidentally runs into a drifter, Jack McCloud, who breaks his leg. Being responsible, Jane invites Jack, and his dog, to stay at her home until his leg has healed. Jack struggles to adapt their lifestyle, and finds himself loved by the family.
tagline: If you really believe, magic will find you
cast: Patrick Swayze|Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio|Joseph Mazzello|David Marshall Grant|Jay O. Sanders
